name: Marketing Agent
description: An A2A agent focused on market research, content generation, and campaign analysis to drive engagement and conversions.

skills.name: Market Research Report
skills.description: Receives a topic or industry, conducts research, and returns a summarized market analysis.

examples.input: Generate a report on current trends in sustainable packaging.
examples.output: Based on market data, sustainable packaging is seeing increased consumer demand due to environmental concerns...

skills.name: Content Creation Brief
skills.description: Takes a product/service and target audience, and generates ideas for marketing content (e.g., blog posts, social media updates).

examples.input: Suggest social media posts for a new eco-friendly cleaning product targeting Gen Z.
examples.output: Here are 3 post ideas for TikTok focusing on sustainability and efficacy...
